Name: Captain Collins
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry on stick (sail).
TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: Sweetened, soured and diluted Canadian whisky.
History: See the history of the Collins cocktail on our Tom Collins page.
Nutrition: One serving of Captain Collins contains 164 calories
